topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5468406e636872540fb10100#post_5468406e636872540fb10100
oh i see
yeah i get those people
think they can just work through shit with no problems

my grandma once cut herself cutting food
she said hell with it and just wrapped it with a cloth, and went through the day bleeding out
she ended up in the hospital for a bit

that was a long while ago and she's fine
but god damnit
